Must first be Fusion Summoned by the effect of "Ominous Wave, Metal XO". You cannot Special Summon monsters, except Metal XO" monsters. Cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. (Quick Effect): You can apply this effect based on whose turn it is.
● Yours: This turn, "Metal XO" monsters you control inflict piercing battle damage.
● Your opponents: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; change it face-down Defense Position.
You can only use each effect of "Froid H-2, Metal XO" once per turn.
2056643.name: Froid H-2, Metal XO

2056720.effect:
3 "Metal XO" monsters with different Levels
Must first be Fusion Summoned by the effect of "Ominous Wave, Metal XO". You cannot Special Summon monsters, except Metal XO" monsters. Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. (Quick Effect): You can apply this effect based on whose turn it is.

You can only use each effect of "Loki A-G, Metal XO" once per turn.
2056720.name: Loki A-G, Metal XO
